name.description: Name is the name of dataset and resulting file name.

row_count.description: Row-count is the number of rows to generate.

order_by.description: Order-by is a list of columns by which to sort the dataset.

separator.description: Separator is a symbol that will separate values in the resulting file.

quote_values.description: Quote-values is an indicator of whether it is necessary to quote output values in the file or not (0/1).

write_method.description: Write-method is a method of writing data.
